title: Help plez
body: So since the latest patch my client seems to crash everytime i try load into a game and its getting pretty god dam annoying riot, i updated all my drivers and graphics cards and still no result, everytime i try connect i either get a error stating that League client has stopped working or i get the client has lost connection error, is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Hey The Gingninj69,

If you happen to be using Lolreplay/recorder to record your games, please exit or uninstall it for now, as it is known to be causing League to crash currently.

If not, I suggest performing a [client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
Thanks man that did the trick, i uninstalled and i could play again haha

Glad it helped! Until the replay developers fix it, I suggest [BaronReplays](https://ahri.tw/en/FAQ/) for your replay recording needs. Good luck :3
